detail_desc: Joggers in marled sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Short pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
High-waisted culottes with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs with a seam at the knees.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with seams. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band inside. Width of brim 14 cm.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, waffled cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Straight-cut, sleeveless V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces at the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with a slight sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ties at the hem.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, frill-trimmed fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft knit with no buttons.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed turtle neck, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Calf-length, pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a frill trim at the top and decorative bow at the front. Small embroidered motif below the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a polo neck and dropped shoulders.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.

Long-sleeved body in stretch lace with a round neckline and narrow, vertical elastication down the front, back and sides, as well as on the sleeves for a draped effect. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless jersey jumpsuit with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Short dress in airy, patterned jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, elasticated, gathered sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an asymmetric flounce at the front and flounced hem.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Short grosgrain necklace with plastic pendants with faceted beads in glass and plastic. Fastens with ties at the back. Total length approx. 98 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads. Length 8.5 cm.
Leggings in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Briefs in lace and mesh with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and string back.

Tunic in an airy weave with a rounded stand-up collar and a V-neck opening at the front. Buttons down the front, a yoke with gathers at the back to create a relaxed fit, long sleeves with rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Henley tops in ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. One of the tops is patterned.

Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with stripes in a contrasting colour and wide elastication at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a double-layered polo neck.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with ties.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Patterned swim shorts with a decorative drawstring and elastication at the back. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style jumper in a rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a wide flounce at the top and one wide shoulder strap. No fasteners.

Striped dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, gentle V-neck and buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Warm-lined hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Calf-length dress in satin with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a voluminous skirt with a wide flounce at the hem.
Straight-cut dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Polo-neck collar in a soft cable knit containing some wool.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sequins on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long, balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Top in jersey crêpe with a gently rounded neckline that has covered elastication at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders and elasticated hems. Gathered tiers for added volume.
Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to shorts. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, patch back pockets and legs that can be folded up with a tab and button.
Cargo shorts in cotton poplin with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a double-layered wrapover skirt with a tie.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and bum while keeping the skirt in shape. High waist, zip fly and button, and a slit at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and a decorative, draped pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, and a detachable soft fabric belt with metal D-rings. Lined.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft printed jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Calf-length skirt in a crinkled weave made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top, and buttons down the front. Recycled polyester lining.
